Augmented Reality with the IDEA store

This is an experiment using augmented reality features with the WebXR Device API. Upon entering AR, you will be able to place AR objects on real-world surfaces.
Launch experiment Learn more

Augmented Reality not supported

Unfortunately, your browser does not support AR features offered by WebXR. No worries! You can still learn about the features of immersive web.

As of September 2019, you may also need:

  • A compatible smartphone running Android O or later, or iOS 11.0 or later.
  • To install Chrome Canary.
  • To install ARCore.
  • To enable two Chrome flags (chrome://flags):
    • WebXRDevice API (#webxr)
    • WebXR Hit Test (#webxr-hit-test).
